statements: UPDATE BusinessIntelligenceReports SET report_name = 'Sales Report', report_content = 'Quarterly Sales Data' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE BusinessIntelligenceReports SET report_date = '2022-05-15', report_name = 'Marketing Report' WHERE report_id = 2;

UPDATE BusinessIntelligenceReports SET report_name = 'Financial Report', report_content = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.' WHERE report_id = 1;

UPDATE BusinessIntelligenceReports SET report_date = '2021-10-15', report_name = 'Sales Report', report_content = 'Quis autem vel eum iriure dolor in hendrerit in vulputate velit esse molestie consequat, vel illum dolore eu feugiat nulla facilisis at vero eros et accumsan et iusto odio dignissim qui blandit praesent luptatum delenit.' WHERE report_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount = 2000.50, order_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE order_id = 100;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_email = 'john@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount = 1500.75, order_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE order_id = 1001;
UPDATE bi_reports SET report_name = 'Sales Report', create_date = NOW() WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE report_data SET total_records = 1000, report_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE data_source_id = 2;
UPDATE bi_reports SET report_name = 'Monthly Sales Report', report_description = 'This report contains monthly sales data', create_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE report_data SET total_records = 1500, report_date = '2022-10-01' WHERE report_id = 1 AND data_source_id = 2;
UPDATE business_intelligence SET salary = 75000 WHERE name = 'Alice';
UPDATE big_data SET size = 15000.50, location = 'New York' WHERE source = 'Sales Data';
UPDATE business_intelligence SET salary = salary * 1.1 WHERE role = 'Analyst';
UPDATE big_data SET date_collected = '2022-12-31' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE business_intelligence_reports SET report_data = 'Updated report data' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE data_sources_usage SET duration_minutes = 120, usage_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE analyst_id = 3 AND source_id = 2;
UPDATE business_intelligence_reports SET report_data = 'Updated data for report 1', report_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE data_sources_usage SET duration_minutes = 120, usage_date = '2021-10-20' WHERE source_id = 2 AND analyst_id = 3;
